The Datafi for Chrome Extension integrates with the Datafi Platform, offering real-time data productivity through a convenient browser interface. It's designed to enhance productivity, for everyone who works with data.

Key Features:

- Chrome Extension: A sidebar overlay in Chrome provides immediate access to custom data insights, allowing users to stay informed without interrupting their workflow

- One-Click Data Cards: Insert context-rich 'data cards' into a variety of business applications with a single click. Whether you're drafting an email or preparing a presentation, these snippets of tailored data insights integrate effortlessly.

- Data Chat Integration: Incorporating our conversational AI assistant, Data Chat, the extension allows users to create data insights using natural language. It also offers the ability to select text on any webpage and generate contextual data insights from connected business databases.

Extensive Compatibility:

The extension is compatible with several widely-used business platforms, ensuring its utility across different work environments:

Your Business, Supercharged.

The Datafi Chrome Extension is intended to bring data insights directly into the user's web browser, simplifying access to information and enhancing productivity. It supports key business platforms, making it a versatile tool for professionals who need quick and easy access to data-driven insights.

HAVE QUESTIONS?
